column4: how i in a BASH SCRIPT "for loop" would I execute a program with the number n as an argument to a program eg: for i  in `seq ` ... do  ./program picture($i).pnm ... done
for i in $(seq); do ./program picture($i).pnm; done
where would i apply the $()? eg: $(`seq 1 50`) doesnt work
don't include the `'s.  $() is often used in place of ``
